amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit any funding of those Amtrak long-distance routes identified by a February 2002 report by the Amtrak Reform Council as unable to recoup 50 cents in revenue, including state subsidies, for each dollar spent to operate the route.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 282 (Roll no. 482).
